subtitle: Connect with your local community - get help or earn money
mapDescription: An interactive map showing jobs near you - the closer, the easier to help!
postOrApply: Post tasks you need help with, or apply to jobs and earn money.
services: From cleaning to deliveries to repairs - find or offer any local service!
browseDesc: Find jobs on the map near you
createAccount: Create a free account to apply for jobs and start earning!
browseWithoutAccount: You can browse jobs without an account, but you'll need to sign up to apply.
agreeToTerms: I understand how Quick Help works and will treat other users with respect, complete jobs I commit to, and pay helpers fairly for completed work.
termsAndPrivacy: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
checkBoxes: Please check the boxes above to continue
alwaysAccess: You can always access this guide from the
